t: Comfort Tech Mattress: Independent Customer Reviews (2025)
s: Very comfy bed, not too firm or soft. No strong smells, ready to sleep on the day of install. Bought this for my RV, and I can't say enough good things about it. Finding an RV king is difficult to begin with, but was happy to see that Costco carried it for about the similar price as the lowest priced RV kings on Amazon. Figure Costco wouldn't put their satisfaction policy on just any product. The mattress is every bit as comfortable ...
